scenes.description: Gigi Murin celebrates her new 3D model, admiring her tail and performing acrobatics.
A wizard character appears and challenges Gigi to perform chores, but they are both attacked and the wizard is abducted by eagles.
Sewer Grem leads Gigi through a dark tunnel to the Grem Kingdom to rescue her friends.
Gigi arrives at the Grem Kingdom and interacts with several Grems about their personal problems.
Gigi visits a general store run by a Grem and prepares to ask for information.

subtitles.original: This is...
subtitles.english: This is...

subtitles.original: Hands!
subtitles.english: Hands!

subtitles.original: You did it!
subtitles.english: You did it!

subtitles.original: You've done it!
subtitles.english: You've done it!

subtitles.original: Oh my God! Look how cute I am!
subtitles.english: Oh my God! Look how cute I am!

subtitles.original: Aw! I've always been cute, but now it's even cute...
subtitles.english: Aw! I've always been cute, but now it's even cute...

subtitles.original: ...now everyone can see how cute I am!
subtitles.english: ...now everyone can see how cute I am!

subtitles.original: Look at that fat tail!
subtitles.english: Look at that fat tail!

subtitles.original: I can do everything!
subtitles.english: I can do everything!

subtitles.original: I can't do that.
subtitles.english: I can't do that.

subtitles.original: Watch this, guys!
subtitles.english: Watch this, guys!

subtitles.original: You've never seen this before.
subtitles.english: You've never seen this before.

subtitles.original: Okay, okay... whee!
subtitles.english: Okay, okay... whee!

subtitles.original: Whee!
subtitles.english: Whee!

subtitles.original: I can do everything!
subtitles.english: I can do everything!

subtitles.original: Two in a row? Just kidding.
subtitles.english: Two in a row? Just kidding.

subtitles.original: I have a world to save!
subtitles.english: I have a world to save!

subtitles.original: Look at that, everyone loves me!
subtitles.english: Look at that, everyone loves me!

subtitles.original: Gigi Murin!
subtitles.english: Gigi Murin!

subtitles.original: Oh, I'm so dizzy.
subtitles.english: Oh, I'm so dizzy.

subtitles.original: Oh, I'm so... I'm so sorry, boss.
subtitles.english: Oh, I'm so... I'm so sorry, boss.

subtitles.original: What... what should I do to save everyone?
subtitles.english: What... what should I do to save everyone?

subtitles.original: The world is spinning... owie.
subtitles.english: The world is spinning... owie.

subtitles.original: Before saving everyone, let's see if you can survive basic chores.
subtitles.english: Before saving everyone, let's see if you can survive basic chores.

subtitles.original: Basic? I can do basic chores!
subtitles.english: Basic? I can do basic chores!

subtitles.original: Let's start with...
subtitles.english: Let's start with...

subtitles.original: Start with what? Start with what?
subtitles.english: Start with what? Start with what?

subtitles.original: What? What are we starting with?
subtitles.english: What? What are we starting with?

subtitles.original: What? What?
subtitles.english: What? What?

subtitles.original: A bird! Go away! What?
subtitles.english: A bird! Go away! What?

subtitles.original: Ouch! Ouch! Wait!
subtitles.english: Ouch! Ouch! Wait!

subtitles.original: What? What? Ouch! Ouch! What are you doing?
subtitles.english: What? What? Ouch! Ouch! What are you doing?

subtitles.original: What? What are you doing with him? Wait! Wait! No!
subtitles.english: What? What are you doing with him? Wait! Wait! No!

subtitles.original: Don't go! Don't go! Please stop! Wait!
subtitles.english: Don't go! Don't go! Please stop! Wait!

subtitles.original: Wait! Wait!
subtitles.english: Wait! Wait!

subtitles.original: No! No!
subtitles.english: No! No!

subtitles.original: The birds took him!
subtitles.english: The birds took him!

subtitles.original: I knew I could never trust a bird!
subtitles.english: I knew I could never trust a bird!

subtitles.original: Hey you. Come here! Follow me!
subtitles.english: Hey you. Come here! Follow me!

subtitles.original: A Grem?
subtitles.english: A Grem?

subtitles.original: Um... I have to help my friend.
subtitles.english: Um... I have to help my friend.

subtitles.original: You're scared and lost... Not knowing what to do, right?
subtitles.english: You're scared and lost... Not knowing what to do, right?

subtitles.original: I'll show you how to save your friends. Follow me!
subtitles.english: I'll show you how to save your friends. Follow me!

subtitles.original: Oh, okay.
subtitles.english: Oh, okay.

subtitles.original: This place is weird.
subtitles.english: This place is weird.

subtitles.original: This place is dark and it smells bad.
subtitles.english: This place is dark and it smells bad.

subtitles.original: Hey it smells good!!!! Do exactly as I say if you want to save your friends!
subtitles.english: Hey it smells good!!!! Do exactly as I say if you want to save your friends!

subtitles.original: Go to the Grem Kingdom and return with the One Ping, a Honkshoe, and a Straw Hat.
subtitles.english: Go to the Grem Kingdom and return with the One Ping, a Honkshoe, and a Straw Hat.

subtitles.original: Why do you need them?
subtitles.english: Why do you need them?

subtitles.original: YOU DON'T GET TO ASK ME ANY QUESTIONS!!! NOW GO GIGI, GOOOOOOO!!
subtitles.english: YOU DON'T GET TO ASK ME ANY QUESTIONS!!! NOW GO GIGI, GOOOOOOO!!

subtitles.original: Okay.
subtitles.english: Okay.

subtitles.original: Whoa! So this is the Grem Kingdom?
subtitles.english: Whoa! So this is the Grem Kingdom?

subtitles.original: It's so cool! There's so many Grems!
subtitles.english: It's so cool! There's so many Grems!

subtitles.original: Does this mean this entire kingdom is mine if I save it?
subtitles.english: Does this mean this entire kingdom is mine if I save it?

subtitles.original: Whoa, there's so many of you.
subtitles.english: Whoa, there's so many of you.

subtitles.original: Oh, not all at once. No, no, no, no.
subtitles.english: Oh, not all at once. No, no, no, no.

subtitles.original: What?
subtitles.english: What?

subtitles.original: Oh, I can't hear you.
subtitles.english: Oh, I can't hear you.

subtitles.original: Let's try this Grem. Lucky little Grem, what's on your mind?
subtitles.english: Let's try this Grem. Lucky little Grem, what's on your mind?

subtitles.original: Things aren't going well with my partner... I need your help to fix our relationship.
subtitles.english: Things aren't going well with my partner... I need your help to fix our relationship.

subtitles.original: Aw, that is not my problem.
subtitles.english: Aw, that is not my problem.

subtitles.original: Ah, okay.
subtitles.english: Ah, okay.

subtitles.original: How about this Grem? Do you have anything interesting to say to me?
subtitles.english: How about this Grem? Do you have anything interesting to say to me?

subtitles.original: My tummy is getting very large and I don't know why. Please come with me to the doctor.
subtitles.english: My tummy is getting very large and I don't know why. Please come with me to the doctor.

subtitles.original: Okay, a little secret. Pregnant.
subtitles.english: Okay, a little secret. Pregnant.

subtitles.original: Okay, how about this one?
subtitles.english: Okay, how about this one?

subtitles.original: Make a contract with me, and become a magical girl!
subtitles.english: Make a contract with me, and become a magical girl!

subtitles.original: Oh, that is not my problem either.
subtitles.english: Oh, that is not my problem either.

subtitles.original: Oh, no, no, no, no. I will not be doing that.
subtitles.english: Oh, no, no, no, no. I will not be doing that.

subtitles.original: I know what happens when you sign a contract.
subtitles.english: I know what happens when you sign a contract.

subtitles.original: You should never put your name down on things.
subtitles.english: You should never put your name down on things.

subtitles.original: Well, these Grems were useless.
subtitles.english: Well, these Grems were useless.

subtitles.original: I think if I use my RPG knowledge, you're supposed to get information from NPCs...
subtitles.english: I think if I use my RPG knowledge, you're supposed to get information from NPCs...

subtitles.original: ...at a store.
subtitles.english: ...at a store.

subtitles.original: And there's so many stalls near me.
subtitles.english: And there's so many stalls near me.

subtitles.original: Let's go to this one!
subtitles.english: Let's go to this one!

subtitles.original: So cute!
subtitles.english: So cute!

subtitles.original: Aw!
subtitles.english: Aw!

subtitles.original: Are you a little worker Grem?
subtitles.english: Are you a little worker Grem?

subtitles.original: Aw!
subtitles.english: Aw!

subtitles.original: How much do you make an hour?
subtitles.english: How much do you make an hour?

subtitles.original: Do you make enough to survive?
subtitles.english: Do you make enough to survive?

subtitles.original: Oh, what is this?
subtitles.english: Oh, what is this?

subtitles.original: For me?
subtitles.english: For me?

subtitles.original: Uh, that's decorative hay, not edible...
subtitles.english: Uh, that's decorative hay, not edible...

subtitles.original: Can I ask you something?
subtitles.english: Can I ask you something?

subtitles.original: Oh, what is this?
subtitles.english: Oh, what is this?

subtitles.original:
- Who's the strongest person around here?
- Where can I get The One Ping?
- Excuse me, where is the bathroom?
subtitles.english:
- Who's the strongest person around here?
- Where can I get The One Ping?
- Excuse me, where is the bathroom?
